LanguageData.OGI_Airstrike_AssaultCannon.label: gatling strafe run
LanguageData.OGI_Airstrike_AssaultCannon.description: Strike ship fills the air with bullets with its twin gatling guns. Covers a large area. Particularly effective against unarmored units.
LanguageData.OGI_Airstrike_Autocannon.label: autocannon assault
LanguageData.OGI_Airstrike_Autocannon.description: The powerful frontal autocannon can deal high damages to armored units and buildings. It does not cover a wide area though.
LanguageData.OGI_Airstrike_RocketFrag.label: assaultcannon and rockets strafe run
LanguageData.OGI_Airstrike_RocketFrag.description: Strike ship attacks with both assaultcannons and rockets. A truly devastative assault.
LanguageData.OGI_Airstrike_RocketKrak.label: assaultcannon and rockets strafe run
LanguageData.OGI_Airstrike_RocketKrak.description: Strike ship attacks with both assaultcannons and rockets. A truly devastative assault.
LanguageData.OGI_BombingRun_Incendiary.label: incendiary bombing run
LanguageData.OGI_BombingRun_Incendiary.description: Strike ship perform a carpet bombing on the targeted area with massive incendiary bombs. Particularly effective against stationnary installations.
